name: Run princess run!
description:
This game is all about using enemies to escape the dungeon.

Move (by using directional arrows) to dodge the dragons that attack you and use them to break the gates and escape this dangerous place.

Only 3 levels for the jam, we ran a bit out of time in the end but you can play them infinitely.

Game done by Antoine Leriche and François Martinage during the bonefire game jam the 28/29/30 of agust 2020.

Featured pre-made asset : Enemies / To help me code the game faster / Environement / Main character / UI
